bibliography:

University of Michigan Library

Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

Davies, S., 1994, Musical Meaning and Expression, Ithaca:

–––, 1755, Réflexions critiques sur
la poësie et sur la peinture, Paris: Pissot.

Kivy, P., 1980, The Corded Shell, Princeton: Princeton

Livingston, P., 2013, ‘Du Bos’ Paradox,’
British Journal of Aesthetics, 53, 393–406.

Lombard, A., 1913, L’Abbé Du Bos: Un
